name: Super Mega Neo Pug
description: Turbo Pug is back! and this time, he's airborne! Fly through deserts, green fields and more stunning environments. Dodge an onslaught of enemies and go head to head with giant bosses! Unlock new costumes for Turbo Pug and new creatures to play as. Please try not to squish your pug!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

reviews.review_text: Its like dark souls with pugs

Super Mega Neo Pug has some of the most revolutionary gameplay I have ever witnessed and has a story filled with deep philosophical questions that makes me ask myself about my purpose in life and my humanity. Few games question the players actions in a way that weighs what we believe is right and wrong. This game tackles the biggest issues in our society from the racial quotas of institutions to what defines life and the balance between privacy and protection. As you progress through each level, you see the same situations from a different point of view. Can anyone's actions truly be justified? Can different cultures and ideologies coexist or can peace never be reached among these different groups. From the beginning of this game, you are driven forward with an unsatisfiable lust for money. This game is an endless cycle of failure (just like you) with the definition of victory being up to the player. Is it reaching a new high score or is it unlocking a new character. It does not matter because the choice is for you to make. Whether or not a game as complex and intriguing as Super Mega Neo Pug is worth putting time and effort into, is also up to you. These are simply my thoughts.  Review (not) sponsored by CSGOLotto.
Worth every penny, because it doesn't cost a lot of pennies.  It does one thing, and it does that one thing very well. It's challenging, but when you can get a groove going, it feels very relaxing.

This game, were do I start? Oh yeah, IT'S ♥♥♥♥ING ADORABLE!!!  On a more reviewy note, the music is fun, all you use is spacebar to fly, and you can unlock a pug wearing a sombrero, a sombrero people!!!  I'm considering getting a pug, tying a cape onto it's collar, and putting a sombrero on it's head.
its one of those games i brainlessly press a button while im having an existential crisis i like it
Well i liked it for the first two hours now i can't play it because I don't have a dx9 pc

This platformer is worth purchasing. The procedurally generated levels make it so that every run is not the same, creating an interesting and varied experience.   I had the most fun challenging friends and family, seeing who could get the highest score. This game is really fun and cute.   If you have sensitive eyes or are prone to headaches, I recommend you watch the game video before playing and try to decide if the game may move too fast for your eyes. It is quite fast and can make my eyes blur over at times.
It is a nice game to play if you just want to kill some time.  And there is pugs!  Who doesn't like pugs!?

Original: 'It's flappy bird - that's it.'  New: 'It's flappy bird - mostly.'  Edit: I probably didn't get that far into the unlocks, to perhaps get the best special skills.  NOTE: Comments contains a Developer response!
Who can say no to pugs? I can't.  Fun little game to kill some time.
I was going to get DOOM but went with this instead since they are so similar. Its one of the best Neo Pug titales to date
GET THIS GAME!!!

Just tried this game and liked it. It is a boredom buster but it's fun. The pug is awesome too! You die often but I think that just fuels the fire to keep playing so you can get more characters. This game is a lot like flappy bird but with shields and new characters. Definitely will be playing this again.

Wonderful little retro inspired game. Love Turbo Pug, regular player, just not very good. Always been a fan of colourful pixel graphics. I like the simplicity behind the game and how it can appeal to anyone, it's got a bit of everything for everyone. The cute retro sound effects and theme music draw you in, it's addictive and rather catchy. Top Notch!
This game is so fun!! It made laugh and cry a lot!!
This game is ok i guess my proplems with it is their is only 4 diffrent stages and all they change is the background look. You should not have to pay for this game (but i do love the pugs)
anyone know where the fire button is???? totally confused :(
What's not to love about this game. 10/10

Whilst originally I Disliked this, it now has a Thumbs Up!  Its nothing like the original bar the 'Pug' name.  Plays like Flappy Bird, only you get to Finger Blast your mouse to 0rgasmic levels of destruction, in order to move half way up the screen, and die after 4 seconds (Hold Mouse).  So I refunded, don't want this boo hoo, yadda yadda....  However, I've come back, I need more of it, its grew on me, it plagued my mind, 'Its got to be better, its me not you' and whilst it isn't like the first, its just as addictive! Well done Dan 'Sir Pugsalot' for another cheap & cheerful game!  Pro's Better menus, good sounds, Improved visuals  Con's No in game controls for Keyboard or Gamepad, Addictive
I get home from school and a friend on steam gifted it to me. WTF

It's Jetpack Joyride, but without any upgrading or the clever game design that made its inspiration such a classic of the genre.  You've played far worse games than this, and in short bursts there is some fun to be had, and there's also no denying it's very cheap. Which makes it the perfect bundle game, but I feel even at $1 your money would be better put towards something that's really only entertaining for a few minutes at a time every 6 months or so.
This game took my virginity.
BEST GAME ON STEAM FEATURES PUGS MUST BUY UNLESS YOU DONT LIKE PUGS, THEN YOU SMELL. 10/10 SOME PUGS
Do you like flappy bird? If yes, have fun! If no, oh no... buddy, it's not too late, get a refund while you still can
Do you like flappy bird? If yes, have fun! If no, oh no... buddy, it's not too late, get a refund while you still can
